name: Portfolio Website
description: A fully custom personal portfolio built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. Features smooth scroll animations, typing effect, responsive navbar, and dynamic project rendering from a JSON file.

name: Spotify Clone
description: Built a responsive Spotify-style music interface using React, Tailwind CSS, and JSON-based data for tracks and playlists. Implemented reusable UI components, playlist browsing, and modern styling to replicate core Spotify UI elements.

name: Google Forms
description: Built a Google Forms clone using the MERN stack with full form creation and response storage. Implemented JWT authentication, secure REST APIs, and a responsive UI using Tailwind CSS.

name: Forever E-commerce
description: Built a fully functional E-commerce platform using the MERN stack with user authentication, product browsing, cart management, and order placement integrated with MongoDB.Developed an admin dashboard to add/remove products, manage inventory, and view customer orders using secure REST APIs and a responsive frontend.

name: Real-Estate
description: Built a responsive real estate website with property listings and search functionality.Created interactive UI components using React.js and styled with Tailwind CSS. Focused on clean design and mobile-friendly layout.

name: CourierBox
description: A full-stack courier booking and tracking system built with the MERN stack. Users can regsiter, log-in/log-out, book parcels and track delivery; admins manage and update parcel status through a secure dashboard.

name: TaskEase
description: Django-based service finder app to hire helpers (maids, drivers, guards) by category and location. Includes user profiles registering, log-in/out, and an admin dashboard for managing listings.

name: MovieApp
description: A Django-based entertainment platform where users can view movies, read about celebrities, subscribe, log in/out, and comment on blogs. Includes user authentication and blog interaction features.
